enhanced_by.method_name: switchClosure(Predicate<? super E>[], Closure<? super E>[], Closure<? super E>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve switching between closures based on predicates or keys.
The method creates predicates used in switchMapClosure for matching keys.
Ensures the input map is not null before proceeding with closure switching.

enhanced_by.method_name: switchClosure(Predicate<? super E>[], Closure<? super E>[])
enhanced_by.reason: Transforms the map into arrays of predicates and closures, which are then used in the switchClosure method.
